original_text: and when Jezebel cut off the prophets of the Lord, Obadiah took a hundred prophets and hid them by fifties in a cave and fed them with bread and water.)
korean_text: 이세벨이 여호와의 선지자들을 멸할 때에 오바댜가 선지자 백 명을 가지고 오십 명씩 굴에 숨기고 떡과 물을 먹였더라

sentences.original_text: and when Jezebel cut off the prophets of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이세벨이 주의 선지자들을 죽였을 때에,

sentences.original_text: and hid them by fifties in a cave
and fed them with bread and water.)
